results.name: Classic Pancakes
results.description: Fluffy pancakes for a delightful breakfast
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together milk and egg. Pour into the dry ingredients and mix until smooth.
Heat a griddle or non-stick pan. Melt butter and ladle batter onto the griddle.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook the other side until golden brown.

results.name: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
instructions: In a wok or skillet, heat sesame oil and sauté minced garlic until fragrant.
Add tofu and stir-fry until golden brown.
Add vegetables and continue stir-frying until they are tender-crisp.
Pour in soy sauce and toss everything together. Serve hot.

results.name: Mango Smoothie
results.description: Refreshing mango smoothie for a tropical treat
instructions: In a blender, combine mango, Greek yogurt, orange juice, honey, and ice cubes.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a glass and enjoy the tropical goodness.

results.name: Caprese Salad
results.description: Simple and elegant salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a serving platter.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze. Season with salt and black pepper.
Serve immediately for a refreshing salad.

results.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
results.description: Homemade cookies with gooey chocolate chips
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a bowl, cream together butter, brown sugar, and granulated sugar until smooth.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla extract.
In a separate bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt. Gradually add to the wet ingredients.
Fold in chocolate chips. Drop rounded tablespoons onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until edges are golden brown. Cool on wire racks.

results.name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
results.description: Creamy Alfredo pasta with tender chicken pieces.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a skillet, heat olive oil. Cook chicken until browned.
Add minced garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes.
Pour in heavy cream and Parmesan. Stir until smooth.
Season with salt and black pepper. Add pasta and toss until coated.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve hot.

results.name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
results.description: A classic Caesar salad with grilled chicken for a hearty meal.
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Grill until fully cooked.
Slice grilled chicken into strips.
In a large bowl, combine chopped romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
Add grilled chicken strips and toss with Caesar dressing.
Serve immediately for a delicious and satisfying salad.

results.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
results.description: Classic Italian spaghetti with rich and flavorful Bolognese sauce.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a skillet, brown ground beef over medium heat. Drain excess fat.
Add chopped onion and minced garlic. Cook until onion is translucent.
Pour in tomato sauce, red wine, dried oregano, salt, and black pepper. Simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Serve Bolognese sauce over cooked spaghetti. Enjoy this classic Italian dish!

results.name: Greek Salad with Lemon Vinaigrette
results.description: A refreshing Greek salad with a zesty lemon dressing.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine diced cucumbers, tomatoes, red bell pepper, red onion, olives, and feta cheese.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and black pepper to make the vinaigrette.
Pour the vinaigrette over the salad and toss until well coated.
Sprinkle fresh oregano on top. Serve immediately for a taste of the Mediterranean.
